title: Update Eyegic logo to use the last uploaded file globally

requirements.text: Update the application to use the last uploaded Eyegic logo file (most recent uploaded logo asset) everywhere the logo is rendered by ensuring `frontend/src/components/brand/BrandLogo.tsx` points to that latest static asset (under `/assets/generated/`) and that all logo placements (desktop header and mobile menu sheet in `frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx`) render the updated logo.

quotes: the logo is incorrect, use the last uploaded file

acceptanceCriteria: `BrandLogo` no longer references an older/incorrect logo path (currently `/assets/generated/EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-2.dim_1536x864.png`) and instead references the last uploaded logo file under `/assets/generated/`.
On desktop, the header logo displays the updated logo without broken-image fallback.
On mobile, opening the menu sheet shows the updated logo at the top of the sheet.
There are no other components rendering a different Eyegic logo asset path (all visible logo instances match the last uploaded file).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, and anything under `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Render logo as a static frontend asset (do not route images through the backend).
nonGoals: Changing the header layout, spacing, or logo sizing beyond what is necessary to swap the logo asset.
Creating a new logo design or modifying the logo image contents.
